jobs.title: Ninja Stuga
jobs.description: A black belt worrior from the Netherlands, which has been transformed into a white ribbon from the original version

jobs.title: Ninja Qualuachi
jobs.description: A black belt worrior from Kumasi, Ghana. To his natives he is called Opanyin Degartsi , meaning the Senior man from the Degartsi family tree

jobs.title: Ninja Omega-Prime
jobs.description: A black belt worrior from the Atlantic Ocean
